com.github.mrm1st3r.cards.game.ui

Class GameActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • com.github.mrm1st3r.cards.game.ui.GameActivity
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ClientGameActivity, HostGameActivity

    public abstract class GameActivity
extends Activity
    This is the base user interface for both, host and client.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Sergius Maier

      • alertBox

        private void alertBox(java.lang.String title,
            java.lang.String msg,
            java.lang.String yes,
            java.lang.String no,
            java.lang.String yesMsg,
            java.lang.String noMsg)
        A dialog box pops up and waits for the choice of the player.
        Parameters:
        title - Title of the dialog box
        msg - Message of the dialog box
        yes - Text displayed on the positive button
        no - Text displayed on the negative button
        yesMsg - Message which will be send to the game if the player clicks the positive button
        noMsg - Message which will be send to the game if the player clicks the negative button
